author: Jenny Gross
title: Theresa May Prods EU for Tough Russia Response
text:
BRUSSELS—U.K. Prime Minister Theresa May on Thursday is pushing European Union leaders to sharpen their response to the poisoning of a Russian former double agent, in a test of how much influence London will have over the EU’s foreign policy once it leaves the bloc.
As London seeks strong condemnation of Russia from the EU, questions remain about the bloc’s willingness to further strain ties with Moscow after years of tense relations​over​Russia’s annexation of​Ukraine’s Crimea peninsula.
...
